text: To get the ISS research back on track, CASIS has examined more than 100 previous microgravity experiments to identify promising research themes. From this, it has opted to focus on life science and medical research, and recently called for proposals for experiments on muscle wasting, osteoporosis and the immune system. The organization also maintains that the ISS should be used to develop products with commercial application and to test those that are either close to or already on the market.
